text: Jerry G. Melvin (July 22, 1929 - February 19, 2020) was an American Republican politician and lawyer. He was born in Bonifay, Florida. Melvin was a member of the Florida House of Representatives from 1968 to 1971, again from 1973 to 1978 and lastly from 1995 to 2005. Melvin died on February 20, 2020 in Crestview, Florida from heart failure, aged 90.Former state representative, area booster Jerry Melvin has died ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Members of the Florida Legislature Category:Lawyers from Florida Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Jerry G. Melvin
